item.title: Running WordPress on Kubernetes
item.description: A good reference about how a WordPress site looks on Stack is the WordPress Spec . Domains Each site needs to have at least one domain. When a request comes to the NGINX Ingress, it'll get routed to the appropriate pods, based on the Host header. Even if you can have multiple domains answering to the same site, you still need the main domain that will be responsible for the WP_HOME and WP_SITEURL constants.
